title: Sum of Two Integers

description.zh-CN: [题目371] Add two integers without + or -....
description.zh-TW: [題目371] Add two integers without + or -....
description.ja: [問題371] Add two integers without + or -....

explanation.en: APL solution for Sum of Two Integers. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
explanation.zh-CN: Sum of Two Integers 的 APL 解决方案。实现使用 APL 的面向数组原语进行简洁表达。
explanation.zh-TW: Sum of Two Integers 的 APL 解決方案。實現使用 APL 的面向陣列原語進行簡潔表達。
explanation.ja: APL solution for Sum of Two Integers. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
explanation.es: APL solution for Sum of Two Integers. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
explanation.de: APL solution for Sum of Two Integers. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
explanation.fr: APL solution for Sum of Two Integers. Implementation uses APL's array-oriented primitives for concise expression.
